doc.title: Nankai University Students’ Dedication during the National Day Vacation
doc.snippet: When all Chinese people are celebrating the National Day and Mid-Autumn Festival, over 100 Nankai University students from the School of Finance, College of Chinese Language and Culture, College of Foreign Languages and public service associations gave up their vacation, and they came to places with massive crowds like the Tianjin Railway Station, the Memorial to Zhou Enlai and Deng Yingchao Metro Station, the Five Great Avenues Minyuan Stadium to do volunteering services like direction guidance, ticket checking, convenience service, order maintenance, so on and so forth, which is a vivid demonstration of the Nankai University’s great traditions of patriotism and dedication and life pursuits of serving the public.
